member.name: D3D12_RESOURCE_DESC1
member.summary: Describes a resource, such as a texture, including a mip region. This structure is used in several methods.

member.name: D3D12_RESOURCE_DESC1.Dimension
member.summary: One member of , specifying the dimensions of the resource (for example, D3D12_RESOURCE_DIMENSION_TEXTURE1D), or whether it is a buffer ((D3D12_RESOURCE_DIMENSION_BUFFER).

member.name: D3D12_RESOURCE_DESC1.Width
member.summary: Specifies the width of the resource.

member.name: D3D12_RESOURCE_DESC1.Height
member.summary: Specifies the height of the resource.

member.name: D3D12_RESOURCE_DESC1.DepthOrArraySize
member.summary: Specifies the depth of the resource, if it is 3D, or the array size if it is an array of 1D or 2D resources.

member.name: D3D12_RESOURCE_DESC1.MipLevels
member.summary: Specifies the number of MIP levels.
